column1: data source:  1994 Criminal Justice Expenditure and Employment Extracts
authors:  Lea S. Gifford and Sue Lindgren
Table 20.   Supplemental data for 49 large city governments, 1994
Note: Jurisdictions without data did not report for 1994, but data is available for prior years.
a/ Population data are from the Bureau of the Census, 1990 Decennial Census of Population and Housing.
b/ "Total general expenditure" excludes utilities, city-operated liquor stores, and insurance benefits.
c/ "General functions only" FTE excludes utilities and city-operated liquor stores.
